name: Into The Infinite
storyline:
Reno is a mischievous inter-dimensional smuggler who bends time and space at will with a device on their wrist. Reno becomes the prime suspect in a time-space terrorism case and the Alternate Reality Police Department (ARPD) bring them in for questioning.
Reno insists that they had nothing to do with any of these events and escapes from their cell. During the getaway the device becomes damaged, plunging Reno into another reality and an inter-dimensional manhunt! With the ARPD hot on Reno's back and little resources, the race is on to clear their name!
summary: Play as Reno, a mischievous inter-dimensional smuggler trying to clear their name! Travel between realities in this third-person action game as you fight with an array of weapons from across the multiverse. Every playthrough is different with procedural layouts and tiers of random weapons!
